# redash_group (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "redash_group" "my_group" {
  name = "my-group"
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
terraform import redash_group.my_group 111 # Group ID
```
